summary: Let your character look like Black Cat from the Marvel comics!
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][b][size=3]Do you want to play as Black Cat from Marvel in Skyrim
This mod is the perfect mod for you!
[/size][/b]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77363-8-1469448941.png[/img]

[b][size=5]Permission[/size]
[/b][size=3]I like the idea of a follower mod. Just like with Harley Quinn, I can not do that myself.
If one of you would like to make a follower mod, just contact me by sending a personal message.
Keep in mind that most of the features within this preset are from other modders.
So by making a follower mod, you will need the permission of the authors too.
I also think that a lot of people would like to see such a follower mod.
Contact me if you want to do this!
[/size]
[b][size=5]Requirements:[/size]
[/b][size=3]RaceMenu
KS Hairdos
Fair skin complexion (with all the make-up features)
[size=3]Stroja's Warpaints[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/60769/?[/url]

[/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77363-3-1469448942.png[/img]

[size=5][b]Recommended:[/b][/size]
[size=3]XP32 Skeleton Extended[/size]
[size=3]UNP or CBBE bodytype. [/size]
[size=3]Bodyslide[/size]
[b]
[size=5]Clothing:[/size]
[/b][size=3]For the clothing, to match Black Cat's appearance, you need two mods:[/size]
[size=3]Ashara Princess of the Woods (for the white fur: collar, arms, feet)[/size]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?

[size=3]SkinTight Dragon wear for the catsuit.[/size]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51323/?



[b][size=5]I hope you will enjoy the mod![/size]
[/b][size=3]Let me know what you think about this. 
I accept requests for any other female characters from comics or games. Just let me know!
Be sure to check out my other mods, if you liked this preset! I have presets from DC villians and there will be more Marvel too![/size]
[b]
[size=5]Check one of my other mods:[/size][/b]
[size=3][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77333-8-1469357395.png[/img][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77333/?]Mystique - RaceMenu Preset[/url][/font][/center]
author: Yourskyrim123
